title: Understanding Workbook Sharing
text: Workbook sharing allows multiple users to edit a workbook simultaneously. However, it limits access to certain features.

title: Features Unavailable with Sharing
text: When workbook sharing is enabled, features like conditional formatting, data validation, and creating or editing charts may be restricted.

hintAnswer: when workbook sharing is enabled, Excel denies access to a number of features, which become available again when workbook sharing is turned off
title: Why Turn Off Workbook Sharing?
text: Consider the limitations imposed by workbook sharing. What happens when you turn it off?
choices: when workbook sharing is enabled, Excel denies access to a number of features, which become available again when workbook sharing is turned off
there is no reason to turn off tracked changes
doing so decreases the amount of power used by your PC
